section.name: Product Installation
section.p: Installation procedures for the Windows Platform and Unix Platform provide details on the setup of environment and PATH variables, together with notes concerning single and multiuser environment configuration.

subsection.name: Fast-Track Installation
subsection.p: To get up and operation ASAP define an environment variable named DPML_HOME pointing to the directory containing the unzipped contents of the Depot installation. Add the bin directory to your path and you should be ready to go.
